summary: Completed frontend testing for semester switcher, week filtering, academic year display, and analytics class filter features. Fixed critical compilation error and verified all core functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Duplicate Badge import causing compilation error (FIXED)
Week tabs show 0 weeks when switching between semesters
Dropdown options have click interception issues

passed_tests: Backend API authentication and all endpoints working (50/50 tests passed)
Dashboard academic year badge displays correctly (Academic Year: 2025-2026)
Dashboard semester toggle buttons functional (First Semester/Second Semester)
Week tabs container and individual week buttons functional
Analytics class filter dropdown opens and shows options
Analytics class filter 'All Classes' selection works
Navigation between Dashboard, Students, and Analytics pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Week filtering by semester needs investigation - weeks are not showing up when switching between semesters on Students page. The logic exists in code but may need data or state management fixes.
